ui.game

Class LayeredMapPanelOtherItems

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ui.game.LayeredMapPanelOtherItems
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class LayeredMapPanelOtherItems
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.util.Observer, java.lang.Runnable
    Author:
    Team 5 This Class is a Jpanel that gets rendered as a layer in LayeredMapPanel class. It is responsible for tasks related to Towers and Critters on the ui side.
    See Also:
